body:
Comment 3: 
I do not see the benefit. I suspect you are worried about large number of threads. But
situation with network Read/Write and Connect is very different. Unlike Read/Write,
Connect only executed on clients, so it is unlikely you will have large number of
Connects in one single time. I do not know what you re doing, but if you are worried
about your thread count, perhaps you could serialize all your Connects in one (or many)
dedicated goroutine.

Perhaps, I am still missing something. Feel free to correct my thinking.

Alex
_Status changed to **WontFix**._
